snippet.title: Distance: Console Edition - Launch Date Trailer | PS5 & PS4
snippet.description:
Wishlist here: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10002564

Distance is coming to PlayStation on July 19th! Read all about what's included: https://refract.com/post/755720762167558144/distance-launches-on-ps4-ps5-july-19th

Melding the intensity of arcade racing with the agility of parkour, Distance catapults you into a neon-soaked world shrouded in mystery. Adapt quickly using your car’s abilities to jump, flip, and fly to overcome deadly hazards and survive.

Website: http://survivethedistance.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/distance
Twitter: https://twitter.com/refractstudios
Twitch: https://twitch.tv/refractstudios
Soundtrack: https://refract.bandcamp.com

Song: Isolation VIP Remix (https://twitter.com/torcht)
